location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

mods.abstract: Imprint:S.D.O. Topo. Dy. No. 14, Exd. C.J.A., April 1911.Distinctive Features:Map produced to illustrate the proposed railway and irrigation scheme in Mesopotamia recommended by Sir William Willcocks. Includes a key and an explanatory note on railways with distances between Baghdad and Basra reported. Issued with notes providing further details concerning suggested works along Tigris, Nahr Melcha and Hai, and cost calculations (‘ENCLOSURE C’, folio 233).Inscriptions:In pencil, above title: ‘0/126’ and ‘Persia/1021-En’.
